name: tuneport-extension
description: Sync YouTube to Spotify and download lossless audio.
author: Microck

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle && npm run copy-assets && npm run tailwind
scripts.bundle: esbuild src/background/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/background.js --platform=browser --target=chrome100 && esbuild src/content/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content.js --platform=browser --target=chrome100 && esbuild src/popup/index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/popup/index.js --platform=browser --target=chrome100 && esbuild src/settings/index.tsx --bundle --outfile=dist/settings/index.js --platform=browser --target=chrome100
scripts.tailwind: tailwindcss -i src/popup/index.css -o dist/popup/index.css && tailwindcss -i src/popup/index.css -o dist/settings/index.css
scripts.build:webstore: npm run build && node scripts/build.js webstore
scripts.build:github: npm run build && node scripts/build.js github
scripts.build:firefox: npm run build && node scripts/build.js firefox
